description: VE Day: Tell us your stories
title: VE Day: Tell us your stories
title_page: VE Day: Tell us your stories - BBC News
maintext:
This year marks the 80th anniversary of the end of World War Two and BBC News would like to hear your memories and stories from the time.
Did you and your family celebrate VE Day with a street party? Do you have photographs passed down from relatives showing the celebrations?
If you have a story to share, or know someone who does, please use the form below to tell us a little bit more.
Some of your stories collected will be published on BBC News platforms, and shared with our partners.
Working with a number of partners, including the Normandy Memorial Trust and the Royal British Legion, the BBC has already spoken to many men and women who served during the War - You can watch their testimonies on the We Were There page.
